mapper.insert: INSERT INTO spring_free_boards (board_no, board_title, board_writer, board_password, board_content, board_filename) VALUES (spring_board_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{writer}, #{password}, #{content}, #{filename})
mapper.update: UPDATE spring_free_boards SET board_title = #{title}, board_content = #{content}, board_filename = #{filename}, board_likes = #{likes}, board_deleted = #{deleted}, board_updated_date = #{updatedDate}, board_deleted_date = #{deletedDate} WHERE board_no = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT board_no AS no, board_title AS title, board_writer AS writer, board_likes AS likes, board_created_date AS createdDate FROM spring_free_boards WHERE board_deleted = 'N' ORDER BY board_no DESC
